name: jssm-viz
description: Visualization of JSSM machines using viz.js

scripts.removedir: rimraf build -f && rimraf dist -f && rimraf docs -f
scripts.createdir: mkdir build && mkdir dist && mkdir docs && cd docs && mkdir docs && cd ..
scripts.clean: npm run removedir && npm run createdir
scripts.make: npm run clean && npm run pack
scripts.audit: text_audit -g ./src/ts/*.ts -t MAJOR WASTEFUL ANY MIXED FIXME CHECKME TESTME STOCHABLE TODO COMEBACK WHARGARBL
scripts.build: npm run make && npm run vet && npm run audit && npm run dist
scripts.nyc-build: npm run vet && npm run make && npm run test-verbose && npm run audit && npm run nyc-test
scripts.dist: cp build/jssm-viz.* dist/ && cp src/html/* docs/ && cp dist/* docs/ && cp node_modules/viz.js/lite.render.js docs/ && cp node_modules/viz.js/viz.js docs/
scripts.travis: npm run nyc-test && npm run coverage

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
